value.title: How to work with files in Azure App Service | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to work with files that you’ve uploaded to Azure App Service. Watch to find out what the different options are for interacting with the file system and your deployed applications in the Azure portal.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/

value.title: Learn all about Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr), Part 1 | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Aman Bhardwaj and Yaron Schneider join Scott Hanselman to talk about the core concepts of Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr). Dapr is a portable, event-driven runtime that makes it easy for developers to build resilient, microservice stateless and stateful applications that run on the cloud and edge

value.title: Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure, Part 1 | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: The Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure guides customers through their cloud journey, to use and adopt cloud services with confidence and in control. In this episode, Scott Bockheim explores the guidance and documentation of the framework with Lara Rubbelke to provide an overview of all the

value.excerpt: NOTE  Throughout this episode there are multiple references to Operations Management Suite; however, this solution actually uses Azure Monitor and Log Analytics.  Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Data Factory (ADF) integration with Azure Monitor, which enables you to route your

value.title: Prepare your cloud environments using Azure landing zones | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Brian Blanchard joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure landing zones and how you can prepare your destination Azure environment—not only to receive migrating applications, but also to balance agility, governance, and security considerations.  0:00 - Overview 0:38 - What is an Azure landing zone? 5:05

value.title: Using Azure Container Registry for building and deploying .NET Core Apps | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: You probably know that Azure Container Registry enables you to store and manage container images securely, but did you know it can also be used as a part of your DevOps pipelines? Jeremy Likness shows Scott Hanselman how ACR can manage your images and even build them for you in the cloud.   0:00 – Overview

value.title: What are work or school, and Microsoft personal accounts? | One Dev Question: Jean-Marc Prieur
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Jean-Marc Prieur, a Principal Program Manager Program Manager working on the Microsoft identity platform, explains the difference between work and school accounts, and personal Microsoft accounts.   Get more information at: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/develop/

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore modern data warehouse analytics in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore modern data warehouse analytics in Azure

topItems.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse
topItems.excerpt: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

topItems.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore data ingestion in Azure

topItems.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore data storage and processing in Azure

value.title: Capture feedback and monitoring data to continuously improve your software
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure release pipelines that continuously build, test, and deploy your applications.

topItems.title: Recommend and design system feedback mechanisms
topItems.excerpt: Learn how surveys and application analytics create a feedback loop that helps you understand the voice of the customer.

topItems.title: Route system feedback to development teams
topItems.excerpt: Learn how continuous monitoring and dashboards give you insight into how customers use your software and where patterns of failure occur.

topItems.title: Manage site reliability
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Implement a Data Streaming Solution with Azure Streaming Analytics
value.excerpt: In this learning path, discover Azure Stream Analytics streaming data, the concepts of event processing, and integration of Internet of Things (IoT) devices.

topItems.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Explore how Azure Stream Analytics integrates with your applications or Internet of Things devices to gain insights with real-time streaming data.

topItems.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results

value.title: Implement a Data Warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Azure Synapse Analytics provides a relational big data store that can scale to Petabytes of data. In this learning path, you will learn how Azure Synapse Analytics can achieve this scale with its’ Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) architecture. Create a data warehouse in minutes and use familiar querying language to build reports. Load massive amounts of data in minutes, and ensure that your data warehouse is secure.

topItems.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly

topItems.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to issue simple queries against Azure Synapse Analytics and how to visualize the data in both Excel and Power BI

topItems.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
topItems.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase

value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: This learning path helps business leaders discover and describe the primary concepts of AI, and the transformational impact AI can have in their organization.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: Learn the primary concepts and technologies of AI, and how Microsoft is turning the latest AI into tools, products, and services that organizations can leverage

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Microsoft creates products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage AI. Understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

value.title: Migrate an ASP.NET web application to Azure with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Migrate an ASP.NET web application to Azure with Visual Studio

topItems.title: Externalize the configuration of an ASP.NET app by using an Azure key vault
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use ConfigurationBuilder to dynamically configure an ASP.NET web app to retrieve secrets from an Azure key vault.

topItems.title: Implement logging in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to implement logging in an ASP.NET web application so you can store log data in Azure Blob storage and incorporate log information into Azure Application Insights performance data.

topItems.title: Improve session scalability in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application by using Azure Cache for Redis
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Cache for Redis to store session data and improve the scalability of web applications.

value.title: Optimize query performance in SQL Server
value.excerpt: Analyze individual query performance and determine where improvements can be made. Explore performance-related Dynamic Management Objects. Investigate how indexes and database design affect queries.

topItems.title: Describe SQL Server query plans
topItems.excerpt: Read and understand various forms of execution plans. Compare estimated vs actual plans. Learn how and why plans are generated.

topItems.title: Evaluate performance improvements
topItems.excerpt: Evaluate possible changes to indexes. Determine the impact of changes to queries and indexes. Explore relevant Dynamic Management Objects.

topItems.title: Explore performance-based design
topItems.excerpt: Evaluate possible changes to indexes. Determine the impact of changes to queries and indexes. Explore relevant Dynamic Management Objects.

value.title: Process and Translate Speech with Azure Cognitive Speech Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement the Speech services found in Azure Cognitive Services by performing speech-to-text transcription, synthesize text input to speech, perform speech translation, and implement speaker recognition in your AI infused applications

topItems.title: Transcribe speech input to text
topItems.excerpt: Speech to text from the speech service, known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.

topItems.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

topItems.title: Translate speech with the speech service
topItems.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

value.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database
value.excerpt: Discover the Azure Cosmos DB Data Explorer tool that enables you to add or modify data. Create stored procedures in JavaScript.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in education
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in education that creates value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Optimize compute costs on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
value.excerpt: Explore strategies that you can use on Azure to optimize your cloud-native application-development process by using Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

value.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Externalize the configuration of an ASP.NET app by using an Azure key vault
value.excerpt: Learn how to use ConfigurationBuilder to dynamically configure an ASP.NET web app to retrieve secrets from an Azure key vault.

value.title: Implement logging in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement logging in an ASP.NET web application so you can store log data in Azure Blob storage and incorporate log information into Azure Application Insights performance data.

value.title: Automate IoT devices management with Azure IoT Hub
value.excerpt: Automate IoT devices management with Azure IoT Hub

value.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure AI and demonstrates how Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can help make AI real for your organization, whether you want to unlock insights from your latent data with knowledge mining, develop your own AI models with machine learning, or build immersive apps using AI.

value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions. Use Vue.js and JavaScript to use SignalR using Visual Studio Code.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Logic Apps
value.excerpt: Learn how to evaluate Logic Apps as an automation choice for your organization using criteria for integration, performance, conditionals, and connectors.

value.title: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL

value.title: Write Ethereum smart contracts by using Solidity
value.excerpt: Learn how to install tools that you can use to develop smart contracts.

value.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
value.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

value.title: Build a web app with Blazor WebAssembly and Visual Studio Code
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up your development environment and build your first WebAssembly app with Blazor, Visual Studio Code, and C#.
